formulas.name: DO1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.DO1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Dropped_Objects__c},"Use signs and barriers to restrict entry or access underwork at elevation"),TRUE)

formulas.name: DO2
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.DO2_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.High_Noise__c},"Use lifting equipment to raise tools to or from the work platform"),TRUE)

formulas.name: E1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.E1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE, INCLUDES({!$Record.Excavations__c},"Have an excavation plan or safe work practice"),TRUE)

formulas.name: E2
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.E2_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Excavations__c},"Locate underground pipes or cables by hand digging"),TRUE)

formulas.name: EAT4
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.EAT4_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Equipment_And_Tools__c},"Use correct tools and equipment for task"),TRUE)

formulas.name: HE3
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.HE3_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.High_Energy_High_Voltage__c},"Observe safe work distances for live cables"),TRUE)

formulas.name: HE5
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.HE5_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.High_Energy_High_Voltage__c},"Use insulated gloves, tools, and mats, GCFI’s"),TRUE)

formulas.name: HS3
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.HS3_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Hazardous_Substances__c},"Implement health hazard controls (Lead, Asbestos, Benzene, H2S, Iron Sulfide, Sulfur Dioxide, NORM)"),TRUE)

formulas.name: IS5
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.IS5_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Ignition_Sources__c},"Bond or earth for static electricity for cathodic protection"),TRUE)

formulas.name: LE2
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.LE2_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Lifting_Equipment__c},"Obtain approval for lifts over processing equipment"),TRUE)

formulas.name: ME3
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.ME3_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Moving_Equipment__c},"Observer to monitor proximity of people and equipment"),TRUE)

formulas.name: ME5
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.ME5_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Moving_Equipment__c},"Do not work in the line of fire"),TRUE)

formulas.name: MH4
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.MH4_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Manual_Handling__c},"Confirm stability of load and work platform"),TRUE)

formulas.name: MH5
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.MH5_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Manual_Handling__c},"Get assistance or mechanical aid to avoid pinch point"),TRUE)

formulas.name: MOE3
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.MOE3_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Mobile_Equipment__c},"Limit and monitor proximity to live equipment on users or access"),TRUE)

formulas.name: P1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.P1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Personnel__c},"Perform induction or training for new workers"),TRUE)

formulas.name: P5
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.P5_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE, INCLUDES({!$Record.Personnel__c},"Manage language barriers Seat belts while driving"),TRUE)

formulas.name: PE4
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.PE4_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Pressurized_Equipment__c},"do not work in the line of fire"),TRUE)

formulas.name: PEE1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.PEE1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Portable_Electrical_Equipment__c},"Inspect equipment and tools for condition and test date currency"),TRUE)

formulas.name: PEE3
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.PEE3_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Portable_Electrical_Equipment__c},"Protect electrical leads from impact or damage"),TRUE)

formulas.name: PLV4
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.PLV4_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Poor_Lighting_Visibility__c},"Know distance from poles and other equipment while driving"),TRUE)

formulas.name: PS3
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.PS3_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Potential_Spills__c},"Have spill cleanup materials and equipment on hand"),TRUE)

formulas.name: PS4
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.PS4_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Potential_Spills__c},"Restrain and isolate hoses when not in use"),TRUE)

formulas.name: SO1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.SO1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Simultaneous_Operations__c},"Follow SIMOPS Matrix MOC required for deviation from SIMOPS restrictions"),TRUE)

formulas.name: SO4
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.SO4_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Simultaneous_Operations__c},"Have permit signed by leader of affected groups"),TRUE)

formulas.name: STF1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.STF1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Slips_Trips_And_Falls__c},"Identify and shield uneven surface or projections"),TRUE)

formulas.name: STF3

formulas.name: STF5

formulas.name: WAH1
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.WAH1_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Work_at_Heights__c},"Discuss working at heights safe work practice"),TRUE)

formulas.name: WAH2
formulas.expression: IF({!$Record.Form__r.WAH2_JSAPDF__c}=FALSE,INCLUDES({!$Record.Work_at_Heights__c},"Verify fall restraint and arrest equipment certification"),TRUE)
